channel.title: Research on Sam Havron
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Sam Havron

item.title: Research
item.description: Current research collaborators (faculty) include: Tom Ristenpart, Nicki Dell, Rahul Chatterjee, and Damon McCoy. Awards Facebook Fellowship Program Finalist 2020 Top 4% of Applicants (1800+ applied) NortonLifeLock Graduate Research Fellowship Finalist 2020 Advocate of New York City Award. 2019 Best Paper Honorable Mention for [3] at ACM CSCW. November 2019 Cornell Graduate School Fellowship. Top 20% of Cornell doctoral students. August 2017 Louis T. Rader Award for Outstanding Undergraduate Education at the University of Virginia.
